user.title: Connect to EnergyID
user.description:
Enter your EnergyID webhook provisioning key and secret. Find these in your EnergyID integration setup under provisioning credentials.

More info: {docs_url}

data_description.provisioning_secret: Your secret associated with the provisioning key.

auth_and_claim.title: Claim device in EnergyID
auth_and_claim.description:
This Home Assistant connection needs to be claimed in your EnergyID portal before it can send data.

1. Go to: {claim_url}
2. Enter code: **{claim_code}**
3. (Code expires: {valid_until})

After successfully claiming the device in EnergyID, click **Submit** below to continue.
